Citation

Source: inst/CITATION

Kiessé TS, Durrieu G (2024). “On a discrete symmetric optimal associated kernel for estimating count data distributions.” Statistics & Probability Letters, 208, 110078. ISSN 0167-7152, doi:10.1016/j.spl.2024.110078, https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0167715224000476. 

@Article{SENGAKIESSE2024110078,
  title = {On a discrete symmetric optimal associated kernel for estimating count data distributions},
  journal = {Statistics & Probability Letters},
  volume = {208},
  pages = {110078},
  year = {2024},
  issn = {0167-7152},
  doi = {https://doi.org/10.1016/j.spl.2024.110078},
  url = {https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S0167715224000476},
  author = {Tristan Senga Kiessé and Gilles Durrieu},
  abstract = {The nonparametric estimator using discrete kernels is one competing alternative to the frequency estimator. We investigate a discrete symmetric optimal kernel. Its properties are established and studied by simulations. An application to real count data is given.},
}

Developed by Tristan Senga Kiesse, Gilles Durrieu, Thomas Fillon.
